alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 27 at 3:23AM EST until November 29 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT EST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts possible where persistent snow bands occur. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight EST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will likely reach 1 to 2 inches per hours at times tonight into Tuesday within the heaviest snow bands.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
